content: small mesh drawstring bag crochet pattern by sara sach please add this pattern to your ravelry favorites ***free pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2016/02/small-mesh-drawstring-bag-crochet html ***video link *** https //youtu be/_bwx1fiaei8 we just retested this pattern added lots of new pictures and a brand new video small mesh drawstring bag please add this pattern to your ravelry favorites skill easy materials crochet hook - h / 5 00 mm yarn - cotton 4 129 yds/3 oz any cotton cotton blend or acrylic yarn needle stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip size 12 inches long x 18 inches around it a great little bag for shopping going to the beach the pool or the park and it is totally washable please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
